entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is wearing the Invisibility Cloak.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A friend of Harry's, who is also wearing the Invisibility Cloak.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: The gamekeeper at Hogwarts, who is trying to keep Buckbeak from being stolen.

entities.name: buckbeak
entities.description: A nervous hippogriff that Hagrid has been taking care of.

entities.name: invisibility cloak
entities.description: A magical object that allows Harry and Hermione to become invisible.

entities.name: committee people
entities.description: A group of people who are trying to catch Buckbeak.

relationships.description: Harry is wearing the Invisibility Cloak.
Hermione is also wearing the Invisibility Cloak.
Hagrid has been taking care of Buckbeak.
The Committee People are trying to catch Buckbeak.
